text: Mu by’ukuri, babandi bahakanye bakanakumira (abantu kuyoboka) inzira ya Allah no kugana ku Musigiti Mutagatifu83 twashyiriyeho abantu bose mu buryo bureshya; baba abawuturiye cyangwa abawugana (tuzabahanisha ibihano bihambaye). N’uzashakakuwukoreramo ikibi icyo ari cyo cyose, tuzamusogongeza ku bihano bibabaza
